# zitadel_project_roles (Data Source)

Datasource representing all project roles in a project, which can be given as authorizations to users. Note: Group-based
filtering is not supported by the ZITADEL API.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->

## Schema

### Required

- `project_id` (String) ID of the project

### Optional

- `display_name` (String) Display name to filter project roles by
- `display_name_method` (String) Method for querying project roles by display name, supported values:
  TEXT_QUERY_METHOD_EQUALS, TEXT_QUERY_METHOD_EQUALS_IGNORE_CASE, TEXT_QUERY_METHOD_STARTS_WITH,
  TEXT_QUERY_METHOD_STARTS_WITH_IGNORE_CASE, TEXT_QUERY_METHOD_CONTAINS, TEXT_QUERY_METHOD_CONTAINS_IGNORE_CASE,
  TEXT_QUERY_METHOD_ENDS_WITH, TEXT_QUERY_METHOD_ENDS_WITH_IGNORE_CASE
- `key_method` (String) Method for querying project roles by key, supported values: TEXT_QUERY_METHOD_EQUALS,
  TEXT_QUERY_METHOD_EQUALS_IGNORE_CASE, TEXT_QUERY_METHOD_STARTS_WITH, TEXT_QUERY_METHOD_STARTS_WITH_IGNORE_CASE,
  TEXT_QUERY_METHOD_CONTAINS, TEXT_QUERY_METHOD_CONTAINS_IGNORE_CASE, TEXT_QUERY_METHOD_ENDS_WITH,
  TEXT_QUERY_METHOD_ENDS_WITH_IGNORE_CASE
- `org_id` (String) ID of the organization
- `role_key` (String) Key to filter project roles by

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
- `role_keys` (List of String) A list of all project role keys
